item.title: Man arrested for allegedly threatening to shoot up airport
item.description: The man's family alerted police and he was taken into custody, authorities said.

item.title: Trump administration can deploy National Guard to Portland, court rules
item.description: An appeals court overturned a temporary restraining order on Monday that prevented the Trump administration from deploying the National Guard to Portl...

item.title: Widespread internet outage snarls businesses as Amazon Web Services works on issue
item.description: Apps including Snapchat, Fortnite and Roblox were experiencing outages on Monday.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: Hawaii’s Kilauea volcano spews lava in latest eruption
item.description: Mount Kilauea, a volcano that has been active in recent years, erupted again on Hawaii’s Big Island, according to the United States Geological Survey.
